name: Kitsune no michi
description:
Game has 2 endings.

Advices  and constructive criticism are welcome, so I can do better next time!

Warnings: weird jokes, mention of alcohol, fantasy creatures

Music: Peritune - Ohayashi2A

Ohayashi2A by Peritune http://peritune.com/
